item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "I must create a system, or be enslaved by another man's. I will not reason and compare: my business is to create." -- William Blake

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before." -- Mae West

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Isaiah Berlin
item.description: "We are doomed to choose and every choice may entail irreparable loss." -- Isaiah Berlin

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Isaiah Berlin
item.description: "Only barbarians are not curious about where they come from, how they came to be where they are, where they appear to be going, whether they wish to go there, and if so, why, and if not, why not." -- Isaiah Berlin

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Isaiah Berlin
item.description: "Both liberty and equality are among the primary goals pursued by human beings throughout many centuries; but total liberty for wolves is death to the lambs, total liberty of the powerful, the gifted, is not compatible with the rights to a decent existence of the weak and the less gifted." -- Isaiah Berlin

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Jessica Treat
item.description: "When you fall in love, you fall in love with yourself, when you kill yourself, you kill someone else." -- Jessica Treat

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "Interpretation is the revenge of the intellectual upon art. " -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "To photograph people is to violate them, by seeing them as they never see themselves, by having knowledge of them that they can never have; it turns people into objects that can be symbolically possessed. Just as a camera is a sublimation of the gun, to photograph someone is a subliminal murder - a soft murder, appropriate to a sad, frightened time." -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "I haven't been everywhere, but it's on my list." -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "Sanity is a cozy lie." -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description:
"The only interesting answers are those which destroy the questions.
" -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "I discovered that I am tired of being a person. Not just tired of being the person I was, but any person at all" -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "Life is a movie; death is a photograph." -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "Time exists in order that everything doesn’t happen all at once…and space exists so that it doesn’t all happen to you." -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "Desire has no history..." -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "to take a photograph is to participate in another person's mortality, vulnerability, mutability. precisely by slicing out this moment and freezing it, all photographs testify to time's relentless melt." -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "The problems of this world are only truly solved in two ways: by extinction or by duplication" -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "Love is friendship on fire -- anonymous" -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "Depression is melancholy minus its charms." -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche
